definition: having a physical or moral blemish so as to make impure according to dietary or ceremonial laws
details:
adjective
- having a physical or moral blemish so as to make impure according to dietary or ceremonial laws
= synonyms: unclean
- (used of persons or behaviors) immoral or obscene
= example: (used of persons or behaviors) immoral or obscene
- combined with extraneous elements
